blogPost.excerpt: Showcase your BEST content with a simple, beautiful SleekBio link for your social media profiles. Link your products, embed videos and podcasts, promote your social channels, and more. Plus, measure results with detailed analytics and a Facebook Pixel.
blogPost.body: Showcase your BEST content with a simple, beautiful SleekBio link for your social media profiles. Link your products, embed videos and podcasts, promote your social channels, and more. Plus, measure results with detailed analytics and a Facebook Pixel.
blogPost.title: SleekBio - The simple, beautiful link for your social media profiles
blogPost.author: noah kagan

localize.description: 用一个简单、漂亮的SleekBio链接为您的社交媒体资料展示您最好的内容。链接您的产品，嵌入视频和播客，推广您的社交渠道，等等。此外，通过详细的分析和Facebook Pixel来衡量结果。
localize.tagline: 为您的社交媒体资料提供简单、美观的链接。

localize.description: 用一個簡單、漂亮的SleekBio鏈接爲您的社交媒體資料展示您最好的內容。鏈接您的產品，嵌入視頻和播客，推廣您的社交渠道，等等。此外，通過詳細的分析和Facebook Pixel來衡量結果。
localize.tagline: 爲您的社交媒體資料提供簡單、美觀的鏈接。

previous.excerpt: PERKS is for Remote Teams, Startups, Gig Workers, Students and many more! The future of work needs a new system to provide people the tools they need to live a happy and productive work life. We built PERKS to bring the best campus experience to everyone!
previous.title: PERKS - The Google Campus Experience digitized

localize.description: PERKS适用于远程团队、创业公司、临时工、学生等。未来的工作需要一个新的系统来为人们提供所需的工具，让他们过上快乐和高效的工作生活。我们打造PERKS是为了给大家带来最好的校园体验!
PERKS適用於遠程團隊、創業公司、臨時工、學生等。未來的工作需要一個新的系統來爲人們提供所需的工具，讓他們過上快樂和高效的工作生活。我們打造PERKS是爲了給大家帶來最好的校園體驗!
